td.content: s:male calligrapher aged 27 years says he is having symptoms of moderate retrosternal chest pain 11-12 times a week, mostly during the day. he is a heavy drinker Patient does not smoke o:Height 173 cm, Weight 70 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16, endoscopy inflamed swollen vocal cards, grade-2 esophagitis, Chest = Scattered crackles with occasional wheeze B/L a:GERD p:performed endoscopy, and performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

The patient reports moderate heart burn, severe regurgitation. he is a 27 yr old white M. he denies ever using cigarettes he is a chronic alcoholic o:Height 173 cm, Weight 70.4 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, Patient appears anxious a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Esophageal manometery.

td.content: s:pt c/o 12 days h/o severe regurgitation. NKDA. patient is a 28 year old white male. o:Height 173 cm, Weight 70.3 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, Chest = Scattered crackles with occasional wheeze B/L a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lansoprazole - 30 mg po qd x 8 week, and ordered Esophageal manometery.
